title: Hold My Hand

They're navigating through a relationship that may have too many hurdles... or perhaps not, as long as she can hold his hand.Aubrey has been hurt in the past, discouraged and degraded. Still, William sees something in her that won't allow him to walk away. Instantly drawn to her but intuitive enough to take it slowly, he courts her. Despite the fight she puts up in accepting William's lifestyle, the bonds he places on Aubrey give her a freedom she desperately needs.
